titles.title: Sing Praise To The Lord You His Godly Ones

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou has turned formed my mourning into dancing. Thou has clothed me in righteousness and gladness. To the end my glory may sing praise to Thee. (2x and sisters echo){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sing Praise to the Lord you His Godly Ones Sing Praise and rejoice in His Holy name.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou has delivered me from enemy oppression. Thou delivered me from what my soul had dreaded. To the end my glory may sing praise to Thee. (2x and sisters echo){/lang-eng}
